attributes.action: NO MORE TAXES, LET GOVERNMENTS WORK BY RECEIVING GRANTS FROM THEIR NATIONAL BANK
attributes.background: IT'S TIME WE STOPPED ALL GOVERNMENTS FROM BEING RELIANT ON TAXES AND SO ON FOR THEIR MONEY! IT'S TIME WE DEVELOPED AND MADE GOOD CAUSES LIKE ALL PUBLIC SERVICES FREE TO FINANCE ALL ACROSS THE WORLD! NATIONAL BANKS SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO PRODUCE AS MUCH MONEY AS THEY WANT AND NOT RELY ON RESERVES!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
The UK Government and Parliament can't control how other international Governments work. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
